page.title: 06EDUCATION:WOODTON AREA
page.content: There are 4 County Primary schools in reach of children living here,Brooke, Woodton,Seething & Ditchingham.The majority attend one of these.Woodton school was founded in 1877,& although it is still housed in the original building _ plus a mobile classroom _ it is light & spacious & its 2.2 teachers provide a wide education for its 56 5_11-year-olds ranging from computers to cookery,music & pottery.A major step forward is the building of indoor lavatories etc. to replace out- door facilities,which were doubtless a great advance in their day.Parent- teacher association fund-raising & voluntary labour have made this possible.For further education child- ren attend secondary schools in Norfolk,at Norwich,Framingham Earl or Loddon,or over the border in Bungay, to which schools they are bussed.
